scripts.build: del /Q/F/S ..\server\views\client\* && SET NODE_ENV=production && webpack --config webpack.config.js && copy /y index.html ..\server\views\client\app.html && xcopy /E images\*.* ..\server\views\client\images && xcopy /E translations\*.json ..\server\views\client\translations
scripts.buildBash: rm -fr ../server/views/client/* && NODE_ENV=production && webpack --config webpack.config.bash.js && cp -f index.html ../server/views/client/index.html && mkdir ../server/views/client/images  && cp -f images/* ../server/views/client/images && mkdir ../server/views/client/translations  && cp translations/*.json ../server/views/client/translations
